column4: quick question.. im investing in a DSLR camera, and i use linux. if i need to do some color grading and levels/adjustments in gimp, will it be just as good quality as aperture/photoshop?
Will you be shooting to jpegs or RAWs?
If you're shooting in RAW format you may want to bring them into rawstudio first.
hmm, well, ultimately they will be web-safe image sizes, and compressed.
